summary:
### **Material Information Summary**  

- **Drilling Results (Phase 2 RC Program, Golconda Project):**  
  - **GRC22:** 47.2m @ **2.00 g/t Au, 40.2 g/t Ag, 0.29% Zn**  
    - Includes **16.8m @ 5.19 g/t Au, 100.2 g/t Ag, 0.57% Zn** (191m depth).  
  - **GRC21:** 77.7m @ **0.76 g/t Au, 11 g/t Ag**  
    - Includes **7.6m @ 5.5 g/t Au, 32.4 g/t Ag, 0.26% Zn**.  
  - **GRC17:** 97.5m @ **0.27 g/t Au, 4.8 g/t Ag, 0.7% Zn**  
    - Includes **9.1m @ 0.8 g/t Au, 9.7 g/t Ag, 1.94% Zn** (EOH).  
  - **12 additional holes pending assays** (GRC27–GRC38, results expected in **4–6 weeks**).  

- **Gallium Halo Intercepts:**  
  - Broad gallium zones across all tested holes, e.g.:  
    - **GRC13:** 216m @ **18.4 g/t Ga**.  
    - **GRC15:** 204m @ **21.7 g/t Ga**.  
    - **GRC21:** 247m @ **16.8 g/t Ga**.  

- **Project Potential:**  
  - Tub Zone mineralization remains **open along strike (700m) and at depth (225m)**.  
  - Adjacent to **Mineral Park Cu-Mo-Ag porphyry deposit** (district-scale potential).  

- **Strategic Importance:**  
  - **Precious metals (Au/Ag) + critical minerals (Ga, Zn)** in mining-friendly Arizona jurisdiction.  

**No capital markets actions (e.g., raising, timetable) or material financial disclosures identified.**
